Changing Personal User Information

Occasionally, you must update information about your user account on the server. For example, you may need to change your password every three months, to follow company policy.

To review and edit your account information:

  1. Select Tools > Server Administration from the menu bar. The Server Administration dialog opens.

  2. Click the My Account button. The My User Account dialog opens.

  3. On the General tab, enter any missing information or change any incorrect information in the following fields:

    • Full name

    • E-mail

    • Phone

    • Voice mail

    • Pager

    • Fax

    • Address

  4. Click OK.

To change your password:

  1. Select Tools > Server Administration from the menu bar. The Server Administration dialog opens.

  2. Click the My Account button. The My User Account dialog opens.

  3. Click the Log on tab.

  4. Do one of the following:

    • Enter and confirm your new password in the Password and Confirm text boxes.

    • If your administrator allows blank passwords and you want to use one, select the Set a blank password check box.

  5. Click OK.
